title: Asu no Esa Kimi dakara
original_name: 明日のエサ　キミだから
sinopse: After a mysterious monster appears at their school, the students decide to feed one student to the monster every day to keep it at bay while waiting for help. After two months, only 7 students are left, and Souta Sasazuka, the lowest of the low in the school caste, is now on the chopping block...
